text: Wahi to hai jisne tumko mitti se paida kiya, phir nutfey se, phir khoon ke lothdey se, phir woh tumhein bachhe ki shakal mein nilkalta hai, phir tumhein badhata hai taake tum apni poori taaqat ko pahunch jao, phir aur badhata hai taa-ke tum budhape ko pahuncho aur tum mein se koi pehle hi wapas bula liya jaata hai. Yeh sab kuch is liye kiya jaata hai taa-ke tum apne muqarrar waqt tak pahunch jao, Aur is liye ke tum haqeeqat ko samjho
